text: (he nabee!) jinhen hamane pustak dee hai, ve us (quraan) se prasann ho rahe hain[1], jo aapakee or utaara gaya hai aur sampradaayon mein kuchh aise bhee hain, jo nahin maanate[2]. aap kah den ki mujhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki allaah kee eebaadat (vandana) karoon aur usaka saajhee na banaoon. main usee kee or bulaata hoon aur usee kee or mujhe jaana hai
